titles.title: STATE Act
Surface Transportation and Taxation Equity Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the Federal tax on fuels by the amount of any increase in the rate of tax on such fuel by the States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
1/6/2015--Introduced. Surface Transportation and Taxation Equity Act or the STATE Act
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the federal excise tax on gasoline and special fuels (but not below two cents per gallon) by corresponding increases in fuel taxes imposed by states as of January 6, 2015 (the date of introduction of this Act).
